npcImporter.HTML.ActorExistText:
Actor Exists!

This actor already exists in your game!

How would you like to proceed?
npcImporter.HTML.ChangeName: Import with different name (current name displayed)
npcImporter.HTML.ActorNotImportedMsg: Actor not imported by user request
npcImporter.HTML.FailedToImport: Failed to import actor (see console for errors)
npcImporter.HTML.Firefox: Paste statblock here if you're using Firefox, Foundry Client, or are over http...
npcImporter.parser.NotValidStablock: Failed to parse. Not a valid statblock.
npcImporter.settings.CompendiumsSelector: Allows for selecting individual compendiums for the Importer to search through
npcImporter.settings.SelectPacksInfo: Selecting a pack means that all associated compendiums will be used
npcImporter.settings.AdditionalTraitsHin:
A comma seperated list of custom stats to use, each entry should be followed by a colon (eg: 'Sanity:, Strain:')
The SWADE System actor additional stats are added by default
npcImporter.settings.BulletPointIconsHin:
Paste here the bullet-point icon(s) used by the statblock, seperated by a pipe '|'.
(There is currently a know issue with adding *)
npcImporter.settings.parseLanguageHint: The language used to parse the statblock
npcImporter.settings.ModifiedSpecialAbil: Edit the Special Abilities section to help NPC Importer be smarter, by replacing each bullet-point with '@' as follows: @e => Edge; @h => hinrance; @w => weapom; @a => armor; @sa => listed as Special Ability item
npcImporter.settings.TokenSettingsHint: Set the default Prototype Token settings for imported actors
npcImporter.settings.IgnoredWoundsHint: Take into account Edges and Abilities which allow to ignore wound
npcImporter.settings.AdditionalWoundsHin: Take into account Size, isWildcard, and (Very) Resilient, which increase max wounds
npcImporter.settings.SetSizeHint: Auto-sets the token size & scale according to creature size
npcImporter.settings.AllAsSpecialAbiliti: If checked all Special Abilities (including weapons) will be imported as Special Abilities items. Otherwise, NPC Importer will try to identify Weapons/Armors and create them as appropriate Gear items
npcImporter.settings.RenderSheet: Open the actors sheet after importing.
